title: Amir Khan 'ditches his brother’s wedding party in Bolton to train in the US'
text:
Showbiz Amir Khan 'ditches his brother’s wedding party in Bolton to train in the US' The boxer is alleged to have been at a training camp and missed Haroon’s celebration - as did his wife Faryal Makhdoom Share Amir Khan missed his brother's wedding party Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Boxer Amir Khan reportedly missed his brother Haroon’s wedding party on Saturday - and spent the day training in San Francisco instead. 
Haroon celebrated his wedding to wife Arifa at Bolton FC’s stadium in front of 1000 guests - but Amir and his wife Faryal Makhdoom were apparently not among that number. 
Amir and Faryal attended Haroon and Arifa’s wedding in Pakistan in 2015, but not the second part of their marriage celebrations. 
Amir's sister Mariyah is reported to have acknowledged the boxer's absence in a speech at the ceremony, mentioning Amir couldn't be here because of training camp. Amir and his wife Faryal, not at his brother's wedding (Photo: Ian Vogler) Haroon Khan and his wife Arifa arrive at the celebration (Photo: LAURA SHEPHERD/MERCURY PRESS) The bash was held at Bolton FC's Macron Stadium (Photo: LAURA SHEPHERD/MERCURY PRESS) Amir was 5000 miles away in San Francisco during the party (Photo: LAURA SHEPHERD/MERCURY PRESS) Amir and Faryal had attended the pair's wedding in Pakistan in 2015 (Photo: LAURA SHEPHERD/MERCURY PRESS) 
“The past few weeks have been incredibly difficult for Amir. He loves his wife but he loves his parents and his siblings too,” a source told the Daily Mail . 
“He’s also close to Haroon because both of them are boxers so to miss his wedding celebration has caused him some angst. But they both understand that he’s in the middle of a training camp and he can’t interrupt that to attend the celebration.” 
It’s just the latest dramatic development for the boxer. Khan has been embroiled in a very public argument between his wife and his family for months. Amir Khan and his family (Photo: Instagram) Amir and Faryal not looking so happy (Photo: Getty) 
The feud started when Faryal posted a semi 'naked' selfie on her Instagram – and Amir's Muslim parents were allegedly disappointed to see their daughter-in-law wearing very little clothing. 
Earlier this week, footage allegedly showing Amir Khan pleasuring himself was leaked online. 
The X-rated clip shows a man - believed to be the boxer - performing a sex act on himself. 
Khan was allegedly recorded performing the act while video chatting with a female model on Skype. 
It is believed to have happened just weeks after the sportsman's wedding to Faryal in 2013.
